text: Mather Tower (later Lincoln Tower) is a Neo-Gothic, terra cotta-clad high-rise structure in Chicago, Illinois, USA. It is located at 75 East Wacker Drive in the downtown "loop" area, adjacent to the Chicago River. ==Other websites== * Page at ChicagoArchitecture.info * Chicago Landmarks: Mather Tower * Emporis listing Category:Skyscrapers in Chicago
title: Mather Tower
